markdownRemark.html: ACTIVA IDIOMAS is a teaching center located in the center of Malaga, situated in a very elegant building in the historic part. General Spanish and English language courses and preparation for examinations in the Spanish language.

frontmatter.title: Activa Idiomas
frontmatter.description: Activa Idiomas - ACTIVA IDIOMAS is a teaching center located in the center of Malaga, situated in a very elegant building in the historic part. General Spanish and English language courses and preparation for examinations in the Spanish language.
